message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value to you at $1500000. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at an exclusive price of $1200000. This offer is designed to ensure both parties benefit from this transaction while securing the sale for me. I trust that this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to your positive response.
